name: Catastrophe (Jkotov, Ilya Sakhar, Jer9L, Welsharess, ShamanLobster)
name_original: Catastrophe (Jkotov, Ilya Sakhar, Jer9L, Welsharess, ShamanLobster)
description:
Synopsis:

The legend tells about the place where all cats get to when all their 9 lives come to an end. There rules a mad goddess of cats, who is simply dying of boredom. You are an old man who came to this place in search of his cat. Will you be able to find your pet before the madness of this place consumes you?

Features:

Simple controls. Just click and run. You'll have to pet a couple of cats, of course.…but that won't stop you, right?

Various interactions with all kinds of cats:

    Cat-bombs – check

    Cats with anvils – check

    Big cats – check

    VERY big cats – check

    Cats with chainsaws…Wait, what?!

Controls: 

WASD+LMB

Tips:

To win the game you need to click on the cats!(not everywhere, trust your feeling) 

on level with giant red cat you need to pet him~

Better play on fullscreen

Team:

JKotov(Jobst Kotov) - programmer

ShamanLobster(IgorK) - programmer, game design(balance)

Jer9L(Jer9L) - game design (narrative)

Welsharess(Welsharess) - art, animation, project management

Ilya Sakhar(ilyaShakar) - sound design
